title: Which forms did you submit to HMRC?
header: Which forms did you submit to HMRC?
paragraph1: Using the Inheritance Tax checker is not the same as submitting a form to HMRC. The checker will give you a result straight away. If you have only used the Inheritance Tax checker, select that you did not have to submit a form.
paragraph2: If you submitted the IHT400 or the IHT400 and IHT421 you will have had to wait for a reply from HMRC.
optionIHT400Conditional: Only select this option if you applied after ((date))
optionIHT400421Conditional: Only select this option if you applied before ((date))
optionNotRequired: I did not have to submit any forms to HMRC

submittedToHMRC.required: You must select an option to continue
submittedToHMRC.unimplemented: This page should not be accessed
